title: Please unlock my account - false reported
body:
As you see in the screenshot, I did not say in toxic way. False reported and 14 days account suspended.

Would you unlock my account?


Thanks

replies.body: Jesus, Riot. Are you guys even trying?
Send a support ticket and keep us updated. Read my post about the IFS works and you may find it helpful depending on your situation.

> [{quoted}](name=Ellatiel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Nm33n3Wx,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2020-01-23T01:48:59.499+0000)
>
> Send a support ticket and keep us updated. Read my post about the IFS works and you may find it helpful depending on your situation.

Your understanding of the IFS is totally wrong, with massive bias as a permabanned and completely unreformed player.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Nm33n3Wx,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2020-01-23T02:20:56.892+0000)
>
> Your understanding of the IFS is totally wrong, with massive bias as a permabanned and completely unreformed player.

Don't think you're reading the right thread. Everything I said is roughly accurate, just without the exact specific parameters of the system.
This is how you know communication is down, used to actually get red posts her regularly for these type of things. Now, nothing at all.
the only rioter that really came here was tantrum and its only been up for 13 minutes(5 minutes when you made your comment)
Tantrum hasn't worked for player behavior in more than a year now.  He changed department some times ago.

Oh riot handing out bans for fucking nothing?
Kinda like they just have an auto ban system, but they told me that doesn't happen.

Oh well guess you were really toxic or something you know riot wouldnt be a bunch of fuckin clowns.
Nothing is going on Riot Citizen hRnrBbWoTr.  Everyone is not getting their accounts behavior actioned over an incompetent system that must not be questioned.
Man If they ban people for that now on a "foolproof" system? with "no errors ever" then I guess redoing a unbanning perma players experiment would be designed to fail
The irony being that, other than sarcastic setups for a strawman arguments, I've never seen anybody claim such things as "foolproof" and "no errors ever".
if only they actually reviewed those cases and monitored accounts... if only. then that experiment would work wonders
[Check with support through a support ticket](https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). They'll be able to check to see if something went wrong with your logs or the punishment itself.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Nm33n3Wx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-01-23T00:12:52.143+0000)
>
> [Check with support through a support ticket](https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). They'll be able to check to see if something went wrong with your logs or the punishment itself.

so i watched a replay of the game, he did not int at all, and he wasnt toxic in his logs. now im actually curious what he was banned for, because riot said mass reporting is the same as 1 report

> [{quoted}](name=Summoner SpeII,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Nm33n3Wx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2020-01-23T02:24:53.234+0000)
>
> so i watched a replay of the game, he did not int at all, and he wasnt toxic in his logs. now im actually curious what he was banned for, because riot said mass reporting is the same as 1 report

Several possibilities when something like this pops up;

Edited image (though I don't see any signs of that here),
IFS tossed out the incorrect logs because the punishment wasn't from something in-game such as for private chat,
or the system simply messed up, either the log system or the system assigning punishments (no system is infallible).

In all three cases, contacting support is all the board users can recommend.
i dont see any suspicious games in ur match history
The only suspicious activity is the Behavior System itself.

Could be pre or post game chat as that goes into the report but not into the chat logs.   

Only real resolution is a support ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=Anomander,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Nm33n3Wx,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2020-01-23T01:15:08.277+0000)
>
> Could be pre or post game chat as that goes into the report but not into the chat logs.   
> 
> Only real resolution is a support ticket.

no pre game and post game are displayed always

Just write to the support! At first you will probably get a reply from Blitz bot, just reply to that and you might get a biological robot (then pray for this bio-robot to have a CPU)!

And do not use the chat, it's a trap!
Nope, they'll tell you to piss off like all other Game 1 actions.
"the system is fair and good" said no one ever.

What if I told you that for a supposed "Player Behavior" team with "educated" members that claim to understand people/psychology; Rito is either very poor in knowing behavior real life history or deliberately emotionally abusing players through their report system / changes in conduct terms.

Sorry about your luck there.  Riot does not care about the players in the game.  Just if enough people report you, you are screwed.  They don't care what set off the player.  They don't care that players think it's funny to troll others, and flame then, then when they get pissed off enough to do something, and others report (who did not stand up for the player to begin with) they get banned.  Got perma banned for going off in a game finally after being told "you suck", "your getting carried" whatever.  Look, I don't usually care, but when sitting at 7/8/8 and had 2 dragons, 1 rift herald, 1 baron, and had been helping team, and flamed by the 4/14 top lane and team doesn't stand up for me, I get tired of it.  It's not 1 game it's many, then when finally say f it and don't help, and flat out tell other team, I hope they win since toxic team, and I get perma banned.  RIOT does not care about player base.  Uninstalling after a few more minutes anyway and won't be back.  They lost someone that has spent hundreds of dollars on game, but they don't care, won't care.  All good, sorry about your ban, but RIOT DOES NOT CARE ABOUT IT's REAL PLAYERS>
